EmailTemplate.description: Notify applicant that department has received their application
EmailTemplate.name: Credential Application Received for MNF
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today()}
Dear {!MUSW__License2__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting your application with the Department of Safety and Professional Services.
If you have any questions please contact the agency during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dsps@wisconsin.gov.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
